title: Brian Cassingena - Why Email Is Not Dead And How To Use It To Maximize Revenue
itunes:title: Brian Cassingena - Why Email Is Not Dead And How To Use It To Maximize Revenue
description: Brian is a former Mindvalley chief copywriter, responsible for at last count $4,256,957 in revenue coming directly from his copy over the last 3 years, $1,348,945 in 2018 alone.
content:encoded: Brian is a former Mindvalley chief copywriter, responsible for at last count $4,256,957 in revenue coming directly from his copy over the last 3 years, $1,348,945 in 2018 alone.
itunes:subtitle: Lessons From Former Mindvalley Chief Copywriter
itunes:author: Zachary Babcock
